actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to provide that a fair proportion of Federal contracts for architectural and engineering services are made with small business concerns.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act to provide that a fair proportion of Federal contracts for architectural and engineering services are made with small business concerns.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to provide that a fair proportion of Federal contracts for architectural and engineering services are made with small business concerns.
